features.featureTitle: Update the Plan mode X button behavior so that pressing X does NOT switch the app mode (must not call the existing Plan→Home mode switch). Instead, while remaining in Plan mode, pressing X must ONLY (1) hide the “My Lists” (CustomLists) section and (2) unhide/show the “Morning Routine” and “Evening Routine” sections, to eliminate the current flickering caused by mode switching/unmounting.
